name: Albert Einstein
what_did:
Einstein changed how we understand space, time, and energy.
He created the theory of relativity and the famous equation E=mc².
He won a Nobel Prize and spoke out for peace and human rights.
why_matters:
Einstein's ideas changed science forever.
He helped people understand the universe in new ways.
He also stood up for justice and learning.

questions.q: What is Einstein’s most famous equation?

fun_fact: Einstein didn’t speak much as a child — people thought he might never talk!
